meanings.definition: A timepiece used to measure the duration of an event.
meanings.sent1: During the race, the coach used stopwatches to time each runner.
meanings.sent2: The officials relied on stopwatches to determine the winner of the competition.
meanings.sent3: The stopwatches decided who crossed the finish line first.
meanings.sent4: In the hands of the referee, stopwatches became the ultimate judges of speed.
meanings.sent5: The ticking of the stopwatches echoed through the stadium, marking each second.

meanings.definition: To pause or discontinue the operation of stopwatches.
meanings.sent1: Please stopwatches before the next round begins.
meanings.sent2: He stopwatches briefly to check the accuracy of the timing.
meanings.sent3: The coach accidentally stopwatches during the crucial moment.
meanings.sent4: She stopwatches for a moment, then resumes timing the laps.
meanings.sent5: Stopwatches for a moment to catch your breath before continuing.
